ReBanner.title: Every Member of Your Family Deserves To Be Safe

items.text: If I leave food too long in the microwave, the smoke detector will alert us.
If someone knocks, I don't have to be scared anymore.
Even if I'm home alone, I know help is just one button away.
If anyone tries to break in, I know my family and home are still protected.

ReSurvey.title: How Safe Is My Home?
ReSurvey.desc: 3 quick questions to find out our solution

survey.question: How often is your home left empty?
Do you live with children, elderly parents, or loved ones with special needs?
What security systems do you currently have installed?

ReAbout.title: How SECOM Protects You
ReAbout.desc:
SECOM goes beyond alarms.
We combine smart technology with human response to truly protect what matters most.

items.title: Instantly spots intrusions, fire, or suspicious activity, even when you're not home.

items.icon: /img/temp/alarm/Residence How SECOM Protects You Control Center.svg
items.title: We only view live video during emergencies, ensuring safety without compromising your privacy.
In a emergency, we don't wait. Our physical response personnel is on the ground. Fast.

ReSolution.title: Secure Every Corner of Your Home
ReSolution.desc: Each room has different risks. SECOM helps you place the right protection in the right place.

itemSlider.title: Smart Video Camera - Outdoor
itemSlider.desc: Monitor your gates, garage, and yard with smart detection and two-way audio.

itemSlider.title: PIR Cam Indoor - Living Room
itemSlider.desc: Watch over your home's central space with reliable motion-sensing protection.

itemSlider.title: Door Contact - Windows
itemSlider.desc: Protect windows from silent entry with smart magnetic sensors.

itemSlider.title: Smoke Detector - Clean Kitchen
itemSlider.desc: Even in the cleanest kitchens, accidents can happen. Stay alert with a smoke detector.

ReQuote.text: I wasn't just looking for a security system, I wanted to feel really safe. SECOM gave me both.

ReTestimonial.title: They Chose SECOM. Here's Why.
ReTestimonial.desc: Every family deserves to feel safe at home. Hear how SECOM has brought peace of mind to families across Indonesia. Real stories from those who trust us every day.

items.testimony: When me and my wife are at work, the kids stay home with our nanny. With SECOM, I can check in anytime. It helps me stay connected and calm throughout the day.
items.name: Andi Widjaja

items.testimony: My parents are often home alone, and they're getting older. Having the panic button makes me feel more at ease knowing they can get help fast.
items.name: Tania Gunawan

items.testimony: We often get packages delivered when no one's home. With SECOM, I can monitor visitors and make sure everything's safe and recorded.
items.name: Teguh Santoso

items.testimony: We just moved into our first house, and I wanted to make sure it was safe for my family. SECOM helped us choose the right security setup. Simple, fast, and now we feel a lot more at ease at home.
items.name: Rudi Adinata

items.testimony: We used to worry whenever we left the house empty, even just for a few hours. Since installing SECOM's system, we feel more at ease. It's not about fear, it's about knowing our home is being looked after.
items.name: Dimas Hadi

RePromotion.title: Because home is where they should always feel safe
RePromotion.desc: With SECOM, you get more than security, you get peace of mind. Protect what matters most, starting today.

title: Introduce SECOM's alarm sensor solutions specifically tailored for Business

AlarmOverview.desc: Your business is where goals are achieved, teams grow, and futures are built. At SECOM, we provide personalized security solutions to help you protect what you've worked hard to build, with confidence, care, and cutting-edge technology.

items.icon: /img/temp/alarm/Residence How SECOM Protects You Control Center.svg
items.title: 24/7 Monitoring
Start with Understanding
items.desc: Our security specialists take time to assess your business site and operations, recommending a solution tailored to your industry needs

items.title: Strategic Design, Complete Coverage
items.desc: We design the layout with precision. Placing sensors, alarms, and cameras where they matter most to protect every critical area.

items.title: Efficient, Professional Installation
items.desc: Our expert technicians ensure a smooth setup process with minimal disruption to your business activities.

items.title: 24/7 Monitoring, Always On
items.desc: Your system is connected to SECOM's Control Center, providing real-time monitoring and rapid emergency response at any time of day.

items.title: Ongoing Support
items.desc: We deliver regular system checks and proactive service, ensuring your security system remains dependable as your business grows.

items.title: Emergency Detected
items.desc: Our sensors detect unusual activity and instantly send a signal to the cloud system.

items.title: SECOM's Control Center
items.desc:
The cloud alerts both you and SECOM's 24/7 Control Center, which will notify you and assign response team to your location.
*If necessary, SECOM will also notify local police or fire services.

items.title: SECOM's Physical Response Team
items.desc: If there's a real threat, SECOM dispatches a trained physical response team to check your property and report live updates, giving you peace of mind even when you're away.

AlarmProduct.title: Advanced Technology, Trusted Protection
AlarmProduct.desc: Explore SECOM's full range of advanced security products designed to protect your business, assets, and people.

products.title: Control Panel
products.desc: The main device that connects all sensors and alarms to SECOM's team that standby 24/7.

products.title: Remote Control
products.desc: A small device to turn the alarm system on or off from a distance.

products.title: Keypad
products.desc: A panel where you enter your personal code to control the alarm system.

products.title: Siren Box
products.desc: A loud sound that goes off when there's a danger, like someone breaking in.

products.title: Smart Video Camera
products.desc: See and interact with unexpected visitors, vehicles coming and going and more, even when you can't be there.

products.title: Door Contact
products.desc: Detects when a door or window is opened. Sends an alert if something unusual happens.

products.title: PIR Camera Indoor
products.desc: A camera inside the house that takes pictures or video when it senses movement.

products.title: PIR Indoor
products.desc: A sensor that detects movement inside your home and triggers the alarm if needed.

products.title: Smoke Detector
products.desc: Detects smoke early to help prevent fires.

products.title: Panic Button
products.desc: A button you press in an emergency to get help from SECOM right away.

AlarmCorners.title: Protect Every Corner of Your Business
AlarmCorners.desc: Explore SECOM's full range of advanced security products designed to protect your business, assets, and people.

AlarmApps.desc: Manage your business security anytime with the SECOM App, from arming the system to live camera checks. For advanced settings, use the SECOM Smart Security portal. Your data stays private, SECOM only accesses footage during verified emergencies.

AlarmFAQ.title: Frequently Asked Questions
AlarmFAQ.desc: Whether you're exploring our security packages or already using our business solutions, this FAQ is here to help you better understand how SECOM's Smart Security service works in your industry

items.question: What is the function of SECOM Smart Security Web Portal and Mobile App?
items.answer: Allow business owners to monitor and manage their security systems anytime, anywhere. You can arm or disarm alarms, view live camera footage, receive real-time alerts. You also can set user management and activity logs, ensuring full visibility and control over your business security.

items.question: What happens when the alarm is triggered at my business location?
items.answer: You'll receive instant notifications through the SECOM Smart Security App. This ensures you're always informed of any unusual activity, no matter where you are. SECOM's 24/7 monitoring team will also respond immediately to verify the situation and take necessary action.

items.question: Will my business data and privacy will be protected with the cloud video storage?
items.answer: Yes. Your privacy is our top priority. All video footage is securely encrypted and stored in the cloud. Only you can access your recordings. SECOM can only view your video footage during verified emergencies and only to ensure your safety. Outside of that, your data remains completely private.

items.question: Can I monitor my business branches via SECOM Smart Security App?
items.answer: Yes. You can monitor and manage multiple business branches under one account. You can easily switch between locations to view live camera feeds, receive alerts, arm or disarm alarms, and manage settings, anytime, anywhere. It's a convenient way to stay in control of all your business sites remotely.

Packages.desc: Paket sewa yang sederhana dan terjangkau untuk bisnis kecil atau kantor. Dilengkapi perangkat keamanan esensial untuk memulai perlindungan.

Packages.desc: Perlindungan menyeluruh dengan fitur keamanan canggih dan tambahan fitur keselamatan, ideal untuk area dengan risiko tinggi.

Packages.desc: Paket pembelian satu kali untuk bisnis kecil atau kantor. Termasuk perangkat keamanan penting untuk memulai. Sederhana, terjangkau, dan sepenuhnya milik Anda.

Packages.desc: Miliki sistem keamanan lengkap dengan perlindungan canggih dan fitur keselamatan tambahan. Ideal untuk area berisiko tinggi dan keamanan jangka panjang bisnis Anda.
